date.source: on 17 September 2023, police officers on an anti-narcotics operation intercepted Defendant in Lam Tin.

placeOfOffence.address: Flowerbed outside Block 17, Sceneway Garden, Lam Tin
placeOfOffence.source: he had been instructed to retrieve the bag from a flowerbed outside Block 17 of Sceneway Garden. ... intercepted Defendant in Lam Tin.

natureOfPlaceOfOffence.source: flowerbed outside Block 17 of Sceneway Garden

traffickingMode.source: I accept the defence counsel’s submission that Defendant’s role was that of a courier simpliciter. ... he had been instructed to retrieve the bag
